sentences.cn: ...对他们的慷慨解囊心存感激的受捐者。

sentences.en: Broadly, there are two possible objections to Rio accepting Chinalco's largesse.
sentences.cn: 总体而言, 可能有两种理由反对力拓接受中铝的慷慨施舍.

sentences.en: Hence the unprecedented largesse of the bank bail - out.
sentences.cn: 这也是为什么对银行的救助是如此前所未有的慷慨.

sentences.en: His largesse has caused resentment that goes beyond the normal envy from fans.
sentences.cn: 这样的慷慨在球迷那里激起了比通常的羡慕强烈得多的憎恨.

sentences.en: Hugo Ch á vez, Venezuela's populist president, is leaving little to chance with his show of largesse.
sentences.cn: 委内瑞拉的民粹主义总统查韦斯(HugoChávez) 将不遗余力地展示他的大手笔.

sentences.en: In unexpected largesse? am I cold.
sentences.cn: 怎会冷漠于意外的赏赐?

sentences.en: Our people are in no need of richer nations'largesse.
sentences.cn: 我国人民不需要富国的施舍.

sentences.en: The guilt, though , and the awkward awareness of living on your laws'largesse , tough.
sentences.cn: 这种内疚感和居住在你 岳 父母家要享受施舍的意识使人感到很难受.

sentences.en: The Independent and the London Evening Standard depend on the largesse of foreign investors.
sentences.cn: 而独立报和英国标准晚报则依靠国外投资者的慷慨解囊勉强维持.

sentences.en: Yet it takes more than a dream and government largesse to succeed as a financial hub.
sentences.cn: 不过,若要梦想成真,光有理想或者挥金如土都还不够.

trans.tran_en: when someone gives money or gifts to people who have less than they do, or the money or gifts that they give
